definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
intimidate at the first glance (idiom); awe-inspiring/terrifying/overwhelming
dichlorvos C4H7Cl2PO4, organic phosphate used as insecticide (loanword)/also called dimethyl dichloro-vinyl phosphate DDVP
to dread punishment/afraid of being arrested for a crime
afraid of the head, terrified of the tail (idiom); ever fearful and nervous/afraid of the slightest thing
afraid of the head, terrified of the tail (idiom); ever fearful and nervous/afraid of the slightest thing
the young will be redoubtable in the years to come (idiom)/the younger generations will surpass us in time
dangerous road/(fig.) perilous or intimidating undertaking

sentences.english: That is why it is healthy for everybody to be afraid of height.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么正常人都是畏高的。

sentences.english: As well as being feared, the Chinese are admired for being cleverer than everybody else.
sentences.chinese: 这些比平常人更聪明的中国人让人又畏又羡。

sentences.english: Yong blending with fear, is a realm of life.
sentences.chinese: 勇与畏相融，是人生的一种境界。

sentences.english: If you find textbooks daunting, try a book for kids.
sentences.chinese: 如果你觉得教材太让人生畏，就试着读读儿童书。

sentences.english: But nothingness can only be found by feeling of dread and death.
sentences.chinese: 而虚无只有在畏和死之中才能被经验到。

sentences.english: Next, we'll talk about Wei Zheng, whom Emperor Taizong feared yet respected.
sentences.chinese: 接下来，我们再说那个令唐太宗又敬又畏的魏征。

sentences.english: Yong blending with fear, constitute a driving force, along with his own ahead.
sentences.chinese: 勇与畏相融，构成了一种动力，带着自己向前冲。
